opencpn-plugin.name: radar
opencpn-plugin.summary: Overlays the radar picture on OpenCPN
opencpn-plugin.author: David S Register
opencpn-plugin.description:
This plugin overlays the radar picture on OpenCPN. A versatile plugin that can be easily adapted to most broadband radars.
Support for OpenCPN V 5.0 and multi canvas with simultaneous overlay of two different radars. Revised multi radar type architecture. Adding a new radar only requires radar knowledge and can reuse the existing display technology. Support for four simultaneously active radars. Multiple brands can be mixed.
